net.minecraftforge.client

Interface WeatherRenderHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderHandler

    public interface WeatherRenderHandler
extends IRenderHandler
    Call Dimension.setWeatherRenderer(net.minecraftforge.client.IRenderHandler) with an implementation of this to override all weather rendering with your own. This includes rain and snow.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface net.minecraftforge.client.IRenderHandler

        render
